newsitem.title: UK: UK's OFT seeks comments on Norweb,Comet deal.
newsitem.headline: UK's OFT seeks comments on Norweb,Comet deal.

text.p: Britain's Office of Fair Trading said on Wednesday it asked for comments on the sale by United Utilities unit NORWEB's retail business to Kingfisher's Comet for 51 million stg.
The OFT said it was considering whether the deal qualifies for investigation under the merger provisions of the Fair Trading Act.
If it does the OFT will consider whether to advise the government to refer the merger to the Monopolies and Mergers Commission. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717.
